comment._content: This is my Great Grandad, Joseph Sullivan

comment.author: 67193564@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/deborahlrowe] Hi Deborah.L - once again, thank you for letting us know it is your great-grandfather in this photograph. You can see we've updated the title for this picture in Flickr, and in our catalogue: nla.gov.au/nla.cat-vn2192496
